data.description: GoodRx is America’s healthcare marketplace. Each month, millions of people visit goodrx.com to find reliable health information and discounts for their healthcare — and we’ve helped people save $60 billion since 2011. We provide prescription discounts that are accepted at more than 70,000 pharmacies in the U.S., as well as telehealth services including doctor visits and lab tests. Our services have been positively reviewed by Good Morning America, The New York Times, NBC News, AARP, and many others.Our goal is to help Americans find convenient and affordable healthcare. We offer solutions for consumers, employers, health plans, and anyone else who shares our desire to provide affordable prescriptions to all Americans.As an intern you will be a part of the 12 week summer internship program that will provide an exceptional learning experience and an opportunity to be a part of a company who is helping Americans find convenient and affordable healthcare. We are currently looking for hard-working, curious and eager students to join our team.About the Role: GoodRx is looking for a Pricing Strategy & Optimization Intern to join the Pricing Strategy team, reporting to the Senior Pricing Analyst of Pricing Strategy & Analytics. This intern will map pharmacy contract terms to claims, group and optimize those claims against market and contractual benchmarks, build a dashboard to track performance, and report on pre- and post-optimization impact. ResponsibilitiesAssess contractual pricing framework to define brand and generic definitions, pricing cost basis and pharmacy reimbursement targets.Map the pricing framework to the claim in redshift to flow into lookerDevelop dashboards and visualization to analyze current and historical pricing trends and performance vs target in each contractual reimbursement bucketIdentify drug opportunities for optimization by raising or lowering pricing relative to pharmacy & GoodRx competitors, U&C price or insurance pricingEstablish a pre period for the drug optimization group and measure performance of claims and revenue impact for price increases and decreases relative to benchmarksReport on performance to contract targets using claims flowing from Redshift -> Looker and the impact/ performance of the pricing optimization Collaborate cross-functionally with pharmacy strategy, pricing strategy and data teams to present insights and recommendations.SkillsExtremely curious and motivatedBasic understanding of SQLExperience with data visualization tools (e.g., Looker, Tableau, or Excel).Ability to synthesize data into actionable insights.Excellent communication and presentation skills.Detail-oriented with a strategic mindset.Required Qualifications:Currently pursuing a Bachelor degree, to which you will return in Fall 2026. Expected Graduation date between May 2027 - June 2028Able to commit to full time internship program for 12 weeks during summer of 2026Preferred location: Hybrid in Santa MonicaCompensation & Benefits:Compensation for undergraduate interns is $22.00 per hourMedical, dental, and vision benefits are available to interns throughout the duration of the internshipOffice perks: hybrid model, catered lunch/snacks/beverages every day, frequent social events, and a fun, tight knit cultureRequired Qualifications:Currently pursuing a Bachelor’s degree, to which you will return to in Fall 2026Expected graduation date between May or June 2027L.A.- based candidates who can work on-site 1-3 days/weekAble to commit to full time internship program for 12 weeks during during summer of 2025***Application deadline: Tuesday, February 3rd, 2026 (Noon PT)***GoodRx also offers medical, dental and vision benefits to interns throughout the duration of the internship.We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company and industry. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of the best and brightest from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has a seat at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunities to excel.With that said, research shows that women and other underrepresented groups apply only if they meet 100% of the criteria. GoodRx is committed to leveling the playing field, and we encourage women, people of color, those in the LGBTQ+ communities, and Veterans to apply for positions even if they don’t necessarily check every box outlined in the job description. Please still get in touch - we’d love to connect and see if you could be good for the role!GoodRx is America's healthcare marketplace. The company offers the most comprehensive and accurate resource for affordable prescription medications in the U.S., gathering pricing information from thousands of pharmacies coast to coast, as well as a telehealth marketplace for online doctor visits and lab tests. Since 2011, Americans with and without health insurance have saved $60 billion using GoodRx and million consumers visit goodrx.com each month to find discounts and information related to their healthcare. GoodRx is the #1 most downloaded medical app on the iOS and Android app stores. For more information, visit www.goodrx.com.We prioritize candidate safety. Please be aware that all official communication will only be sent from @goodrx.com or goodrx@myworkday.com addresses.
requirements: Currently pursuing a Bachelor degree, to which you will return in Fall 2026.
